Sentencas: This work reports an investigation of the impact of microstructure on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) composed of nickel yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni YSZ).
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: X-ray nano computed tomography (nano-CT) was used to obtain three-dimensional (3D) models of Ni-YSZ composite anode samples subjected to different thermal cycles.
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Key parameters, such as triple phase boundary (TPB) density, were calculated using 3D reconstructions.
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The electrochemical reaction occurring at active-TPB was modeled by the Lattice Boltzmann Method for simulation of multi-component mass transfer in porous anodes.
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The effect of different electrode geometries on the mass transfer and the electrochemical reaction in anodes was studied by TPB distributions measured by nano CT for samples subjected to different thermal cycles.
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The concentration polarization and the activation polarization were estimated respectively.
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that a combined approach involving nano-CT experiments in conjunction with simulations of gas transport and electrochemical reactions using the Lattice Boltzmann method can be used to better understand the relationship between electrode microstructure and performance of nickel yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes.
Titulo: Modeling of gas transport with electrochemical reaction in nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia anode during thermal cycling by Lattice Boltzmann method
